p: O. europaea plant parts were collected in the Cala community, geographical coordinates 31.52.30°S, 27.69.80°E, Eastern Cape Province, South Africa during the winter of 2016. The plant was identified by Cala Traditional Health Practitioners using the vernacular name umNquma and was authenticated by Mr. Tony Dold, a Plant Taxonomist at Selmar Schonland Herbarium, Rhodes University, South Africa. The Voucher (No ADE 2016/2) was deposited in the Giffen Herbarium, University of Fort Hare.
